channel.title: Projects on Shuhei A. Horiguchi
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Shuhei A. Horiguchi

item.title: Reinforcement Learning Model of the Immune System
item.description: Understanding Immune system with Reinforcement Learning Theory. Publications: Workshop on Theoretical Biology Q-bio Caravan 2019 Annual Meeting of JSMB

item.title: OUXT Polaris
item.description: OUXT Polaris is a team for the Maritime RobotX Challenge. I was the team leader on 2018 Challenge at Honolulu. We received judge’s special award. We were funded by Leave a Nest Co., Ltd. : The Nippon Foundation Marine Engineering Award (第40回リバネス研究費 日本財団海洋工学賞), and seven companies. We were also supported by crowdfunding at academist (波風の影響はどうするか？船の自動航行に挑む！) Technical Design Paper S. Horiguchi*, R. Tanaka, K. Yamada, R. Nakabayashi, et al. Development of a navigation system with high function and high reusability for Maritime RobotX Challenge 2018.
